body_html: If compiling the binary using bazel, I suspect you are not compiling your binary with -c opt or --copt=-mavx on the command lines. But we'd need more information to debug this anyway.
body_text: If compiling the binary using bazel, I suspect you are not compiling your binary with -c opt or --copt=-mavx  on the command lines.  But we'd need more information to debug this anyway.
body: If compiling the binary using bazel, I suspect you are not compiling your binary with -c opt or --copt=-mavx  on the command lines.  But we'd need more information to debug this anyway.
